app.name: Swiss cMIOS Installer
app.long_description:
This cMIOS replaces the original MIOS (v10); the installer has the option to reinstall the original MIOS instead.
All installation is done by patching, so the app gives you the option to download a copy of original MIOS from Nintendo Update Server, or to use a copy named "RVL-mios-v10.wad" on the root of your SD card or USB drive.
To launch the built-in Swiss app, hold Y during any GameCube mode load. For example, hold Y in Wii Swiss Booter v1.1, or on the disc channel/Priiloader with a GameCube game included. When not holding Y, this cMIOS should behave identically to original MIOS and WiiGator cMIOS.
